name: sdkdite
description: SKD DITE 2D10 System for Foundry VTT

scripts.build:db: fvtt package workon sdkdite --type System && fvtt package pack ancestries --in packs/_source/ancestries --out packs
scripts.build:json: fvtt package workon sdkdite --type System && fvtt package unpack ancestries --in packs/ancestries --out packs/_source/ancestries
